thread.title: Alexis Sanchez: Juventus and PSG both believe they can tempt Arsenal into selling rebel star striker
thread.title_full: Alexis Sanchez: Juventus and PSG both believe they can tempt Arsenal into selling rebel star striker

author: aterrell
title: Alexis Sanchez: Juventus and PSG both believe they can tempt Arsenal into selling rebel star striker
text:
Alexis Sanchez: Juventus and PSG both believe they can tempt Arsenal into selling rebel star striker 
Speculation increases around Chilean's future with still no new contract agreed with the Gunners Gossip Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ALEXIS SANCHEZ could be set for a move to either Juventus or Paris Saint-Germain as his contract renewal saga drags on. 
The Chilean has yet to sign a new deal at the Emirates after switching to North London from Barcelona in 2014. Getty Images 4 Alexis Sanchez has netted 19 times for Arsenal this season – but has failed to agree a new contract 
And according to The Mirror , the giants of Italian and French football are ready to do battle with each other over the 28-year-old, who has scored 19 times for Arsenal this season. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The Gunners have reportedly offered Sanchez a contract of £180,000 a week, but he has been pushing for a far greater salary. 
As SunSport revealed last week, he would rather wait till the end of the season and see the club’s final league position before making a hard and final decision on whether to leave English football. EPA Alexis Sanchez celebrated scoring two goals for Arsenal over the weekend including a controversial handball AP:Associated Press Alexis Sanchez has cut a frustrated figure at Arsenal this season as their Premier League title charge has faltered Alexis Sanchez scores Arsenal’s all important first goal against Hull with his hand 
Mesut Ozil is also a player understood to be in the same position, bargaining hard for a bigger deal, with the German's agent reportedly corroborating information gleaned from meetings with Arsenal's board. 
PSG are encouraged by the fact that Sanchez's wage demands are high , being one of only a few cash-rich clubs that could seem to afford his pay packet. Related Articles Helping hands Arsenal 2 Hull 0: Alexis Sanchez punches in the opener and scores penalty after Sam Clucas is sent off... for controversial handball 'I did not see it' Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger issues a vintage response to Alexis Sanchez's handball against Hull 'It was handball' Andrew Robertson reveals referee Mark Clattenburg said SORRY for allowing Sanchez's goal to stand Five things Mesut Ozil non-existent again as Sanchez saves Arsene Wenger... while Harry Maguire looks a future England star 'The irony...' Twitter reacts as Thierry Henry insists Sanchez's opener SHOULD have stood... despite it going in off his hand PA:Press Association 4 Alexis Sanchez nets from the penalty spot against Hull in the Premier League 
Sanchez has been in red-hot form at times this season, but has also shown his frustration on the pitch when he has deemed his team-mates ill-equipped for the Gunners' Premier League title push. 
The first goal appeared to be a controversial handball into the net and the second a penalty and in time-honoured fashion Arsene Wenger claimed he did not see the incident. Arsenal star Alexis Sanchez reveals his favourite moment in football
